src: 竹屋内，白颜正望着嬉戏打闹的白小晨与小龙儿，蓦然间，她听到外面传来一阵吵闹的声音，柳眉轻蹙：“外面发生什么事了？为何有吵闹的声音？”
ref: While inside the dainty looking bamboo cabin, Bai Yan was just in the middle of watching her son and Dragony playing out in the front yard when she overheard the commotion: “What’s happening outside, why is there so much noise?”
hyp: Inside the bamboo house, Bai Yan was watching Bai Xiaochen and Xiao Long'er play and frolic. Suddenly, she heard a commotion outside and furrowed her brows, asking, "What is happening outside? Why is there so much noise?"

“朱雀。”
rel_tgt: Chapter 834: Return to the Holy Land (Part Two)
"Zhuque."

src: “你出去看看。”
ref: “Go have a look.”
hyp: "Go outside and take a look."
rel_src: “朱雀。”
竹屋内，白颜正望着嬉戏打闹的白小晨与小龙儿，蓦然间，她听到外面传来一阵吵闹的声音，柳眉轻蹙：“外面发生什么事了？为何有吵闹的声音？”
rel_tgt: "Zhuque."

Inside the bamboo house, Bai Yan was watching Bai Xiaochen and Xiao Long'er play and frolic. Suddenly, she heard a commotion outside and furrowed her brows, asking, "What is happening outside? Why is there so much noise?"

src: 朱雀拱了拱拳头，领命退下，半响之后，她推开竹屋的门走了进来，迟疑的说道：“王后，外面有两个人，是来找你的……”
ref: Arching her first, the phoenix woman left as told to investigate only to return not long afterwards. Hesitant in her voice: “Queen, there are two people outside wanting to meet you….”
hyp: "Zhuque clenched her fists, accepted the order, and after a while, she pushed open the door of the bamboo house and walked in, hesitantly saying, 'Your Majesty, there are two people outside looking for you...'"

src: 话落，她从椅子上缓步站起，向着门外而去。
ref: Getting up from the chair, Bai Yan casually strolled out of the cabin to find two unexpected people quivering at her entrance.
hyp: With that, she slowly stood up from her chair and walked towards the door.
rel_src: “你出去看看。”
白颜扬眉，“那我出去看看，是谁来找我。”
rel_tgt: "Go outside and take a look."
Bai Yan raised her eyebrows and said, "Then I'll go outside to see who is looking for me."

src: 屋外，血色天空之下，两人颤颤巍巍的从前方爬来，或许是爬的路太多，导致他们的身下淌过一条血痕，落入白颜的眼中，分外的刺目。
ref: Perhaps it’s the fact that they had climbed up the mountain in such an indignant manner, but those kneecaps had already been ridden with blood, thus leaving a trail behind themselves as well.
hyp: Outside the house, beneath the blood-red sky, two figures trembled as they crawled from the front. Perhaps it was the countless paths they had crawled that caused a trail of blood to flow beneath them, which caught Bai Yan's eye, particularly jarring.

src: 二长老脸色苍白，颤抖的身子匍匐在地，哆嗦着道：“王后，我是来向你负荆请罪的，当日，是我轻信了那个冒牌货，才让王后误会了王，一切都是我的错，我愿意任打任骂，请王后降罪。”
ref: Pale in the face, Second Elder uncomfortably answers first: “Queen, I am here to atone for my sin. That day I foolishly believed in that imposter’s word and caused the misunderstanding between you and His Majesty, everything is my fault. I am willing to bear any form of punishment you see fit, please punish me.”
hyp: The Second Elder's face was pale, and his trembling body crawled on the ground as he stammered, "Your Majesty, I have come to confess my sins to you. That day, I was deceived by that imposter, which led you to misunderstand the King. It was all my fault, and I am willing to accept any punishment. Please, Your Majesty, show mercy."
rel_src: 朱雀拱了拱拳头，领命退下，半响之后，她推开竹屋的门走了进来，迟疑的说道：“王后，外面有两个人，是来找你的……”
白颜眉头轻皱，冷声问道。
rel_tgt: "Zhuque clenched her fists, accepted the order, and after a while, she pushed open the door of the bamboo house and walked in, hesitantly saying, 'Your Majesty, there are two people outside looking for you...'"
Bai Yan furrowed her brows slightly and asked coldly.

src: “不，王后，是我的错，是我没有将王的命令带给你，事实上，当日王为解除妖界封印而离开了王宫，他让我回来通知王后，我并没有能够做到，这才给了奸人有机可乘。”
ref: “No Queen, the fault is mine and not Second elder’s. His Majesty ordered me to bring you word of his departure in order to lift the seal, but I got careless and mishandled the mission. This is all my fault, please punish me instead.”
hyp: "No, Your Majesty, it is my fault. I failed to deliver the King's orders to you. In fact, that day the King left the palace to lift the seal on the demon realm, and he instructed me to return and inform you, but I was unable to do so, which gave the villain an opportunity."
rel_src: 朱雀拱了拱拳头，领命退下，半响之后，她推开竹屋的门走了进来，迟疑的说道：“王后，外面有两个人，是来找你的……”
二长老脸色苍白，颤抖的身子匍匐在地，哆嗦着道：“王后，我是来向你负荆请罪的，当日，是我轻信了那个冒牌货，才让王后误会了王，一切都是我的错，我愿意任打任骂，请王后降罪。”
rel_tgt: "Zhuque clenched her fists, accepted the order, and after a while, she pushed open the door of the bamboo house and walked in, hesitantly saying, 'Your Majesty, there are two people outside looking for you...'"

The Second Elder's face was pale, and his trembling body crawled on the ground as he stammered, "Your Majesty, I have come to confess my sins to you. That day, I was deceived by that imposter, which led you to misunderstand the King. It was all my fault, and I am willing to accept any punishment. Please, Your Majesty, show mercy."

src: 火羽跪在地上，满脸是泪：“千错万错都是我的错，王后想打想骂，我绝无二话。”他将身后的竹条拿到手中，两掌相托，递到白颜面前，深深的低下了脑袋，一脸的视死如归。
ref: Kneeling there with tears slobbering up his face, Fire Plume held nothing back and pulled one of the bamboo sticks out from his back.
hyp: Huo Yu knelt on the ground, his face full of tears: "All the mistakes are mine, Your Majesty. If you wish to hit or scold me, I will not say a word." He took the bamboo strips from behind him, placed them in his palms, and presented them to Bai Yan, deeply bowing his head with an expression of one ready to face death.
rel_src: 二长老脸色苍白，颤抖的身子匍匐在地，哆嗦着道：“王后，我是来向你负荆请罪的，当日，是我轻信了那个冒牌货，才让王后误会了王，一切都是我的错，我愿意任打任骂，请王后降罪。”
“不，王后，是我的错，是我没有将王的命令带给你，事实上，当日王为解除妖界封印而离开了王宫，他让我回来通知王后，我并没有能够做到，这才给了奸人有机可乘。”
rel_tgt: The Second Elder's face was pale, and his trembling body crawled on the ground as he stammered, "Your Majesty, I have come to confess my sins to you. That day, I was deceived by that imposter, which led you to misunderstand the King. It was all my fault, and I am willing to accept any punishment. Please, Your Majesty, show mercy."

"No, Your Majesty, it is my fault. I failed to deliver the King's orders to you. In fact, that day the King left the palace to lift the seal on the demon realm, and he instructed me to return and inform you, but I was unable to do so, which gave the villain an opportunity."

src: 白颜的手，缓缓的握住了火羽拖到面前的竹条，她的神色淡然，目光中透着让人无法看懂的光芒。
ref: Presenting it before his queen, it’s obvious he wants her to whip him with the damn thing.
hyp: Bai Yan's hand slowly grasped the bamboo strips that Huo Yu had dragged before her; her expression was calm, and her gaze contained an inscrutable brilliance.
rel_src: 二长老脸色苍白，颤抖的身子匍匐在地，哆嗦着道：“王后，我是来向你负荆请罪的，当日，是我轻信了那个冒牌货，才让王后误会了王，一切都是我的错，我愿意任打任骂，请王后降罪。”
火羽跪在地上，满脸是泪：“千错万错都是我的错，王后想打想骂，我绝无二话。”他将身后的竹条拿到手中，两掌相托，递到白颜面前，深深的低下了脑袋，一脸的视死如归。
rel_tgt: The Second Elder's face was pale, and his trembling body crawled on the ground as he stammered, "Your Majesty, I have come to confess my sins to you. That day, I was deceived by that imposter, which led you to misunderstand the King. It was all my fault, and I am willing to accept any punishment. Please, Your Majesty, show mercy."

Huo Yu knelt on the ground, his face full of tears: "All the mistakes are mine, Your Majesty. If you wish to hit or scold me, I will not say a word." He took the bamboo strips from behind him, placed them in his palms, and presented them to Bai Yan, deeply bowing his head with an expression of one ready to face death.

src: 似是察觉到竹条离手，火羽的身子僵住了，他紧紧的咬着牙关，等着那势如破竹般的一击。
ref: But words are words. When the item finally left his hand after Bai Yan picked it up, his body inherently froze over for the impending strike.
hyp: It seemed that he sensed the bamboo strips slipping from his grasp; Huo Yu's body stiffened, and he clenched his teeth tightly, bracing himself for the impending blow that would come like a bolt from the blue.

白颜的手，缓缓的握住了火羽拖到面前的竹条，她的神色淡然，目光中透着让人无法看懂的光芒。

He took the bamboo strips from behind him, placed them in his palms, and presented them to Bai Yan, deeply bowing his head with an expression of one ready to face death.
Bai Yan's hand slowly grasped the bamboo strips that Huo Yu had dragged before her; her expression was calm, and her gaze contained an inscrutable brilliance.

src: “你们这一路爬来，受了不少罪？”
ref: “Did you suffer a lot when crawling up here?” It was Bai Yan who eventually broke the awkward moment with her words.
hyp: "What hardships have you endured crawling all this way?"
new_src_summary: 该文段出自一个奇幻小说的章节，主要描绘了白颜与两名前来请求原谅的角色之间的紧张对话。故事发生在一个充满神秘色彩的环境中，外界的吵闹声引发了白颜的关注，她决定出去探查情况。两名角色，二长老和火羽，因过去的误会而跪求白颜的宽恕，承认了自己的错误，并愿意接受惩罚。白颜在面对他们的请求时，表现出冷静和淡然的态度。最终，当火羽以为会遭受惩罚时，白颜却将手中的竹条化为灰烬，展现出她的力量和决策。文段整体风格紧张而神秘，语气中带有严肃与戏剧性。
new_tgt_summary: In Chapter 834: Return to the Holy Land (Part Two), Bai Yan is inside a bamboo house watching Bai Xiaochen and Xiao Long'er play when she hears a commotion outside. Zhuque informs her that two individuals are looking for her. Bai Yan steps outside to find two figures, the Second Elder and Huo Yu, crawling on the ground, blood trailing behind them. The Second Elder confesses his sins, claiming he was deceived by an imposter, while Huo Yu takes responsibility for failing to deliver the King's orders. Both plead for Bai Yan's mercy, with Huo Yu offering bamboo strips as a sign of his readiness to accept punishment. However, instead of punishing them, Bai Yan ignites the bamboo strips, turning them to ashes, leaving Huo Yu in shock.
rel_src: 屋外，血色天空之下，两人颤颤巍巍的从前方爬来，或许是爬的路太多，导致他们的身下淌过一条血痕，落入白颜的眼中，分外的刺目。
“你们这是在干什么？”
rel_tgt: Outside the house, beneath the blood-red sky, two figures trembled as they crawled from the front. Perhaps it was the countless paths they had crawled that caused a trail of blood to flow beneath them, which caught Bai Yan's eye, particularly jarring.
"What are you doing?"

火羽跪在地上，满脸是泪：“千错万错都是我的错，王后想打想骂，我绝无二话。”他将身后的竹条拿到手中，两掌相托，递到白颜面前，深深的低下了脑袋，一脸的视死如归。

That day, I was deceived by that imposter, which led you to misunderstand the King. It was all my fault, and I am willing to accept any punishment. Please, Your Majesty, show mercy."

Huo Yu knelt on the ground, his face full of tears: "All the mistakes are mine, Your Majesty. If you wish to hit or scold me, I will not say a word." He took the bamboo strips from behind him, placed them in his palms, and presented them to Bai Yan, deeply bowing his head with an expression of one ready to face death.

火羽愕然的仰头，却见白颜手中的竹条冒出了一阵火焰，瞬间就燃烧为了灰烬。

Huo Yu looked up in astonishment, only to see the bamboo strips in Bai Yan's hand burst into flames, instantly turning to ashes.

src: “既如此，那你们的罪已经偿还完了，起来吧。”
ref: “In that case then your crimes have been atoned.”
hyp: "Since that is the case, your sins have been repaid in full. Rise."
rel_src: 二长老脸色苍白，颤抖的身子匍匐在地，哆嗦着道：“王后，我是来向你负荆请罪的，当日，是我轻信了那个冒牌货，才让王后误会了王，一切都是我的错，我愿意任打任骂，请王后降罪。”
火羽跪在地上，满脸是泪：“千错万错都是我的错，王后想打想骂，我绝无二话。”他将身后的竹条拿到手中，两掌相托，递到白颜面前，深深的低下了脑袋，一脸的视死如归。
rel_tgt: The Second Elder's face was pale, and his trembling body crawled on the ground as he stammered, "Your Majesty, I have come to confess my sins to you. That day, I was deceived by that imposter, which led you to misunderstand the King. It was all my fault, and I am willing to accept any punishment. Please, Your Majesty, show mercy."

Huo Yu knelt on the ground, his face full of tears: "All the mistakes are mine, Your Majesty. If you wish to hit or scold me, I will not say a word." He took the bamboo strips from behind him, placed them in his palms, and presented them to Bai Yan, deeply bowing his head with an expression of one ready to face death.

src: 火羽的身体僵硬如铁，不敢相信白颜如此轻易就放过了他们？

src: 在来之前，他们已经做好了遍体鳞伤的准备！
ref: In fact, this bird man has prepared for the worse.
hyp: Before coming, they had already prepared to be covered in bruises!
rel_src: 屋外，血色天空之下，两人颤颤巍巍的从前方爬来，或许是爬的路太多，导致他们的身下淌过一条血痕，落入白颜的眼中，分外的刺目。
“你们这一路爬来，受了不少罪？”
rel_tgt: Outside the house, beneath the blood-red sky, two figures trembled as they crawled from the front. Perhaps it was the countless paths they had crawled that caused a trail of blood to flow beneath them, which caught Bai Yan's eye, particularly jarring.
"What hardships have you endured crawling all this way?"

src: 现如今，她连抽都没抽他们一下，就消除了他们的罪。
